package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: Rdist
package-manager.description: Rdist is a program to maintain identical copies of files over multiple hosts. It preserves the owner, group, mode, and mtime of files if possible and can update programs that are executing.

item.para: Force permission to 0:0 for all files
